text: Percy "Pat" Reid was a Canadian football player who played for the Toronto Argonauts. He won the Grey Cup with them in 1945, 1946 and 1947.http://www.justsportsstats.com/footballstatsindex.php?player_id=reidpat001http://www.profootballarchives.com/1947irfutor.html ==References== Category:Canadian football ends Category:Toronto Argonauts players Category:Grey Cup champions Category:Year of birth missing
title: Pat Reid (Canadian football)
